profile.about: I’m an Applied LLM & Data Scientist currently pursuing a Master’s in Data Science at NYU’s Center for Data Science, working on applied LLM research, post-training, RL, and RAG, and focused on building reliable, evaluation‑driven AI systems.

experience.title: Applied LLM Research
experience.company: New York University (NYU Applied LLM Research)
experience.location: New York, New York, United States
experience.description: Post-trained Qwen2.5-0.5B using RLVR with GRPO (VERL) on GSM8K, improving reasoning accuracy from 33% to 63%; designed hybrid local/meta-reward weighting to improve inference stability and reasoning trace quality; built citation-aware RAG pipelines using MiniLM retrieval, cross-encoder reranking, and NLI-based validation to reduce hallucinations; evaluated LLM reasoning via chain-of-thought analysis, trace validity checks, and GPT-4o–based error analysis.
